item.title: Meet The Champion: March 2021
item.description: Get to know about Tyler Wardhaugh Welcome to the monthly series Meet The Champion. Last month we spoke to Aaron Smith, the winner of April 2021. Today we are talking to Tyler Wardhaugh, the winner of March 2021 of The Weekly Challenge. I hope you are going to enjoy the interview. Mohammad: Tell us about your technical background? Tyler: I began my career doing web development in the early ’90s.
